# scm_authentication_profile_list (Data Source)

Retrieves a listing of config items.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "scm_authentication_profile_list" "all_profiles" {
  # The 'folder' is required to specify where to look for the profiles.
  limit  = 10
  folder = "All"
}

# -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
# OUTPUT: Display the fetched list data
# -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

output "fetched_profile_list_summary" {
  description = "Summary of profiles retrieved by the SCM Authentication Profile List data source."
  value = {
    count_of_rules_fetched = data.scm_authentication_profile_list.all_profiles.total
    # We access the list of profiles using the 'data' attribute, and then take the first one
    first_rule_name = data.scm_authentication_profile_list.all_profiles.data[0].name
  }
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `device` (String) The device of the item.
- `folder` (String) The folder of the item. Default: Shared.
- `limit` (Number) The max number of items to return. Default: 200.
- `name` (String) The name of the item.
- `offset` (Number) The offset of the first item to return.
- `snippet` (String) The snippet of the item.

### Read-Only

- `data` (Attributes List) The data. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--data))
- `tfid` (String) The Terraform ID.
- `total` (Number) The total number of items.

<a id="nestedatt--data"></a>
### Nested Schema for `data`

Required:

- `id` (String) The UUID of the authentication profile

Optional:

- `name` (String) The name of the authentication profile

Read-Only:

- `allow_list` (List of String) The allow_list of the authentication profile
- `device` (String) The device in which the resource is defined

> ℹ️ **Note:** You must specify exactly one of `device`, `folder`, and `snippet`.
- `folder` (String) The folder in which the resource is defined

> ℹ️ **Note:** You must specify exactly one of `device`, `folder`, and `snippet`.
- `lockout` (Attributes) Lockout object of the authentication profile (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--data--lockout))
- `method` (Attributes) method object of authentication profile (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--data--method))
- `multi_factor_auth` (Attributes) Multi factor auth (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--data--multi_factor_auth))
- `single_sign_on` (Attributes) Single sign on (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--data--single_sign_on))
- `snippet` (String) The snippet in which the resource is defined

> ℹ️ **Note:** You must specify exactly one of `device`, `folder`, and `snippet`.
- `tfid` (String) The Terraform ID.
- `user_domain` (String) User domain
- `username_modifier` (String) Username modifier
